Text: For get car press ~ , then type >>spawn landstalker

For get car press ~ , then type "spawn landstalker" Enter , then ~
instead "landstalker" use any of name from first column.

Car with "+" have EPM mod
when in EPM car , press Num0 , for disable Auto mod, and then Home|End for deploy

After start Game press "m" button, it's disable auto recovery, and F9 , it's enabled Nitro Mod.


For use nitro hold your Movie Cam button.

telekinez:
press b for push ,
z for grab,
x for up all,
j for center all
